options.content:
Globus Tasks
  • This dashboard shows the top sources and destinations by volume and rate of all Globus Tasks.
  • Click on an organization name in one of the tables to see the Task data dashboard for that organization.
  • The slope graph below shows the top pairs of organizations by volume. Darker lines correspond with larger volume.
  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.src.community:$community AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)
meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)
meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst.community:$community AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)
